title: How to Catch a Vet
description: alternate cover edition of ASIN B08Y1MZQWVThe first thing I learned at Vet school was to always expect the unexpected.Well, I sure never saw Santiago Torres or his adorable Great Dane coming.Santi is everything I’m not. Tall, confident, overbearing, and if I’m to believe his advances, he’s also very experienced in...well, you know what.I always play safe, but it’s time to ditch the v-card. We couldn’t be more different, but that doesn’t matter because this is just a one time thing.I’m not going to want more, right?I’m not going to fall for him, right?How to Catch a Vet is the sixth book in the Chester Falls series and features an opposites attract story between a virgin and a player, a Great Dane with a tendency to rescue- read kidnap- other people’s pets, and a small town like no other.
author: Ana Ashley
